name: Super Shine Bros. Melee
overview: This is a mod that (optionally) gives every character a shine. You can choose from either Fox's shine, Falco's shine, or the character's default down B by using the D-Pad on the CSS. All shine tech has been faithfully recreated, including JC on frame 4, turnaround, mulitshining, invisible shine, hold shine, shine grab, etc etc.
